title:
Just curious,



Between 5th ave & 4th street(on Wooster) new trees have been planted and a long vacant two story house has been demolished today. That would make two ajoining vacant lots clear.  Is there a new project in the making?



Thanks
text:
Neither the city of Wilmington nor the department of transportation
have any information on specific projects planned for the area,
although the house was demolished.
